plot: Set in a dystopian future world inside a city populated by androids. We follow the story of TEK 115, an android built to maintain the city's power core, as he defies his programming to discover a life beyond his restrictive protocols.
title: Future's End: Electronic Dreams
plot_es: Set in a dystopian future world inside a city populated by androids. We follow the story of TEK 115, an android built to maintain the city's power core, as he defies his programming to discover a life beyond his restrictive protocols.
plot_en: Set in a dystopian future world inside a city populated by androids. We follow the story of TEK 115, an android built to maintain the city's power core, as he defies his programming to discover a life beyond his restrictive protocols.
